title: iQOO 15 Ultra to have the biggest active cooling fan ever
description: The iQOO 15 was introduced in China in October and then started appearing in other countries a month later. vivo's sub-brand is now working on the iQOO 15 Ultra, according to a new rumor from Digital Chat Station on Weibo. This device was rumored in October as well, and today we get more purported details about it. The iQOO 15 Ultra will become official before February 17. It will be focused on gaming, as rumored before. It will have an active cooling fan as well as shoulder buttons. The fan will be the largest ever put inside a smartphone and will have the best cooling...

title: Poco M8 and Poco M8 Pro prices and specs outed by premature retailer listings
description: The Poco M8 is getting official on January 8, and ahead of that the brand has already started its teaser campaign, even showing the device's design. The M8 Pro might join the M8 on that date. If you're wondering what to expect in terms of pricing, however, Poco itself is understandably staying mum on that front, but a Russian retailer has already prematurely listed the upcoming devices. Poco M8 Keeping in mind that pricing doesn't directly translate from one currency to another, as taxes are wildly different across the world, note that the M8 with 8GB of RAM and 256GB of...

title: TCL unveils the Note A1 NxtPaper digital notepad
description: Today TCL has officially unveiled the Note A1 NxtPaper, a digital note taking device that's aiming to compete against the ReMarkable Paper Pro and even the Kindle Scribe. TCL's device has an 8,000 mAh battery with "long standby" and support for 33W wired charging, 8GB of RAM, 256GB of storage, and an 11.5-inch 2200x1440 NxtPaper Pure display with 120Hz refresh rate, 300-nit peak brightness, certified eye comfort, and paper-like reflection-free clarity. It has adaptive brightness too for reduced eye strain in any ambient lighting conditions. It's powered by MediaTek's Helio G100 SoC and has...

title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra to come with new lens to combat flare
description: We've heard a few rumors about the Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra's camera system, and the latest, coming out of China, claims Samsung will address some camera issues with its upcoming flagship. We are referring to a post by popular tipster Ice Universe on Weibo. It is in Chinese, and machine translation to English suggests the Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra's camera will have reduced lens flare. Additionally, the Galaxy S26 Ultra will feature "enhanced lens and coating technology," and skin tones will no longer turn yellow in images. Ice Universe's Weibo post machine translated from Chinese...

title: Realme Neo8 Infinite edition retail box leaks, display specs revealed
description: A recent leak suggested that the Realme Neo8 will debut in China in January. Now, another leak hints that Realme may also introduce a Neo8 Infinite edition alongside it. The Realme Neo8 Infinite edition’s retail box image has surfaced online. According to the tipster who shared the image, the box notes that the phone will feature a Samsung screen. Meanwhile, leakster Digital Chat Station has revealed that the Neo8 series will come with a Samsung-made display that will offer a refresh rate of 165Hz. The screen is said to use the latest luminescent material and offer specs similar to...

title: Oppo Find N6 tipped to pack a 200MP rear camera
description: Oppo’s next foldable flagship phone, the Find N6, is rumored to launch in February 2026. While there’s no official announcement regarding the launch, a new leak has revealed new details about the foldable. According to well known leakster Digital Chat Station, the Find N6 will feature a triple rear camera setup with two 50MP sensors and a 200MP sensor. Oppo Find N5 featured a 50MP periscope telephoto camera. The tipster believes that Oppo may use the 200MP sensor for the periscope telephoto camera. Previously, the phone was tipped to offer a 50MP periscope telephoto. The Oppo...

title: Poco M8's launch date and design revealed
description: Poco has announced it will unveil the Poco M8 in India on January 8 at 12 PM local time. The company said that the Poco M8 is "built for a new generation of users who seek performance with standout aesthetic," and it will bring a fresh design-led approach to the mid-range smartphone segment in India. Poco hasn't detailed the M8's specs sheet, but the brand said it will be 7.35mm thin and weigh 178 g, making it the "slimmest and lightest" smartphone in the segment. Slim by design. Sharp by attitude.7.35mm thin.Built to stand apart.#DesignedToSlay #PocoM85G pic.twitter.com/Rf4ByGbd39—...

title: More vivo X300 Ultra specs surface in new leak
description: vivo X300 Ultra is expected to launch globally soon, as it recently received certification in Europe. Ahead of any official announcement, multiple leaks have surfaced online, revealing the phone’s key specs. The latest leak has revealed the display details of the vivo X300 Ultra. According to tipster Digital Chat Station, the upcoming camera flagship will sport a flat 6.82-inch BOE LTPO display with 2K resolution. It will offer a flat metal frame and will not include the camera button, which was present on the vivo X200 Ultra. As per the tipster, the rear camera module uses the same...

title: iQOO Z11 Turbo runs Geekbench revealing its chipset and memory amount
description: The iQOO Z11 Turbo is coming soon to China, and a few days ago the brand revealed its rear design. Now, the phone has been spotted in the Geekbench database with the model number V2536A. It's powered by the Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 SoC, paired with 16GB of RAM. It runs Android 16. As you can see from the screenshot below, the prototype which ran Geekbench managed a single-core score of 2,753 and a multi-core score of 8,990, but as always we'd caution you against taking such scores too seriously as the device hasn't been launched yet. The Z11 Turbo's leaked specs include a 6.59-inch flat...

title: Xiaomi 17 family might be getting another member soon
description: Xiaomi has already launched the 17, 17 Pro, 17 Pro Max, and 17 Ultra, but apparently there might be a fifth member of the 17 family coming. According to prolific Chinese leaker Digital Chat Station, the company is working on a new member of this series, which will be "a minor iteration", though it's unclear of what. It has a large 6.8" to 6.9" flat screen with ultra-narrow bezels and it's powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC, just like the rest of the family. The upcoming device also has a periscope telephoto camera, like the Pros and the Ultra. Xiaomi 17 Pro Max The new...

title: Global vivo X300 Ultra gets certified ahead of launch
description: vivo seems to be getting ready to launch the upcoming X300 Ultra outside of China as well, which is very welcome news since that hasn't been the case for its predecessors. The global version of the X300 Ultra, with the model number V2562, has been certified in Europe ahead of its release. According to a previous certification, the X300 Ultra will support 100W wired charging. Past rumors claimed it would arrive before the end of April with a 7,000 mAh battery, a 200MP main camera using Sony's IMX09E 1/1.12" type sensor, a 200MP periscope telephoto camera using Sony's IMX09A sensor, a...

title: Samsung will have its own standalone exhibition space for CES
description: At CES in early January, Samsung won't have a traditional booth. Instead, the company has announced that it's going its own way, doing its own thing, setting up a standalone exhibition hall at The Wynn. There, Samsung says it will "curate an experience that adopts techniques used in art galleries and museums" to unveil its new products. The company has previously teased new TVs, monitors, and appliances all being revealed at this new location. Aside from being an exhibition space, Samsung's CES home at The Wynn enables presentations, events, technology forums, and consultations with...

title: Motorola is teasing an announcement coming on January 6
description: Motorola's Chinese arm started teasing the X70 Air Pro, and now its international account on X is also teasing something coming on January 6. This may in fact be the same device. A taste of what’s next. January 6, 2026. pic.twitter.com/2gDPAdUqaq— motorola (@Moto) December 29, 2025 The handset sold in China as the X70 Air is known internationally as the Edge 70, and the first device in the upcoming Signature line is expected to be the Edge 70 Ultra - whether it ends up being called that or not. So the X70 Air Pro and Edge 70 Ultra / Signature could be the same phone. This has been...

title: OnePlus Turbo 6 and Turbo 6V teaser videos surface, including an unboxing
description: OnePlus will make the Turbo 6 and Turbo 6V official on January 8, as the first two members of its new Turbo range of devices (we don't know why it went straight to 6 either). Ahead of that, the company has revealed their designs and key specs earlier today, and now we also have two teaser videos for you to look at. The first one is about the Turbo 6 line, showing both phones. Next up, we have a quick unboxing of the Turbo 6, showing the iconic OnePlus red box and its contents - which include a case and an 80W charging brick in China, since brands are less concerned with penny...

title: Realme 16 Pro+ chipset and other specs confirmed ahead of launch
description: Realme recently confirmed several key specifications of the 16 Pro, and now it has revealed details about the 16 Pro+ model. The Realme 16 Pro series is set to launch on January 6. The company has updated the online listing for the Realme 16 Pro+ with new details. As per the website, the phone is confirmed to be powered by the Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 SoC. As per Realme, the phone has managed to achieve a score of 1.44 million on the AnTuTu benchmark. It will come with up to 12GB LPDDR5X and 512GB of storage. Further, the company confirmed that the 16 Pro+ will sport a 4D curved...

title: Ai+ NovaFlip launch timeframe confirmed
description: Ai+ is a relatively young tech brand led by former Realme India CEO Madhav Sheth and it is set to launch its first foldable phone – the NovaFlip soon in India. The brand has been teasing the device for some time now and we have a launch time frame to look forward to. NovaFlip is set to make its debut in Q1, 2026. Ai+ NovaFlip is confirmed to launch in Q1,2026 This means we should see the NovaFlip launch in the foreseeable future as we await a proper launch date confirmation. In terms of design, we can see some similarities to the nubia Flip2 but the NovaFlip features a red accented...

title: Latest batch of Oppo Find X9s key specs emerge
description: Oppo is expected to launch new members in its Find X9 series soon, and one of those will be the Find X9s. The device is rumored to feature compact dimensions in line with its predecessor and we now have more details thanks to tipster Digital Chat Station who revealed the upcoming phone’s key specs. As per the report, Find X9s will bring a 6.3” flat OLED display featuring an ultrasonic fingerprint scanner. The panel is expected to feature LTPS technology and a 1.5K resolution based on previous info from the same source. Oppo Find X9 Pro The more interesting bit is the cameras....

title: Samsung is bringing Google Photos to its TVs
description: Samsung announced that it is bringing Google Photos to its smart TVs. This would mark the first time Google Photos is available as an app on any TV platform, as even Google's own Android TVs currently don't have native support. Google Photos is set to debut in three feature tiers starting in early 2026, with Memories being the first available feature. As per Samsung’s press release, Memories will “show curated stories based on people, locations and meaningful moments”, and the feature will be exclusive to eligible Samsung TVs from March. Samsung TV users are also getting access to...

title: Honor Power 2 launch date revealed, to pack a 10,080mAh battery
description: Honor has finally confirmed the launch date of the Power 2 and has also revealed its rear design and color options. The upcoming smartphone will pack a massive 10,080mAh battery. In a Weibo post, Honor announced that the Power 2 will debut in China on January 5. The company also showcased the phone’s rear design, which closely resembles the iPhone 17 Pro. The phone will be available in an orange color option similar to the iPhone. The Honor Power 2 appears to have three camera cutouts housed inside a rectangular module that spreads across the width of the phone. It will be...

title: OnePlus Turbo 6 and Turbo 6V to debut on January 8, design and key specs revealed
description: After a series of recent leaks, OnePlus has officially confirmed the launch date for its new Turbo 6 smartphone series. The lineup will include the OnePlus Turbo 6 and the Turbo 6V, and the company has also revealed their design, color options, and key specs. The OnePlus Turbo 6 and Turbo 6V will debut in China on January 8. OnePlus has shared the design of both phones and the colors. Both devices are also listed online confirming their RAM and storage configurations. Meanwhile, OnePlus also posted a video on Weibo that revealed a few key specs of the phones. As per the...
